roles.title: Research Intern
roles.description: Analyzing neuronal spike-train and connectivity data using Python, R, and MATLAB for lab pipelines (spike sorting, spectral analysis, quality-control reporting). Performing MEA electrophysiological recordings (plate preparation, neuronal culture handling, identification of key network activity metrics). Producing a documented analysis module and research report linking computational methods to biological interpretation, and delivering findings in a final presentation.

roles.title: Developer Trainee
roles.description: Utilizing Meridian developer package to build AI-assisted overview-detail interfaces for dynamic data exploration. Implementing customizable view specifications for user personalization of interface layouts. Developing interactive prototypes showcasing end-user-driven customization for complex information workflows.

roles.title: Founder
roles.description: Creating NGYL website with HTML, CSS, and Javascript to increase organization awareness and volunteer sign-up. Providing a communication platform for organization mission and events. Organizing and inviting 4 industry professionals for a STEM career seminar (200+ participants). Teaching 300+ students in subjects like Python, drones robotics, Lego robotics, and machine learning.
